title: Major countries in bismuth mine production 2015 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Countrys on X-axis for 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Production in metric tons.
Out of all 5 groups, 2018 had the highest Production in metric tons in Country China and 2015 had the lowest Production in metric tons in Country Laos.
Among all the Countrys, 2015 had the highest Production in metric tons 7500.0 in Country China and lowest value 0.0 in Country Laos.
The maximum Production in metric tons for 2015 that was found in Country China was 7500.0 times larger than the minimum Production in metric tons observed in Country Laos.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Production in metric tons on the Y-axis for 10 different Countrys for 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Country China had the maximum Production in metric tons among all 5 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Production in metric tons was observed in Country Laos for 2015.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Countrys on X-axis for 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Production in metric tons.
Out of all 5 groups, 2018 had the highest Production in metric tons in Country China and 2015 had the lowest Production in metric tons in Country Laos.
Among all the Countrys, 2015 had the highest Production in metric tons 7500.0 in Country China and lowest value 0.0 in Country Laos.
The maximum Production in metric tons for 2015 that was found in Country China was 7500.0 times larger than the minimum Production in metric tons observed in Country Laos.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Countrys on X-axis for 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Production in metric tons.
In Country China, 2018 had the highest Production in metric tons 14000.0 among the 5 groups and in Laos, 2015 had the lowest Production in metric tons 0.0.
Among all the Countrys, 2015 had the highest Production in metric tons in Country China and lowest Production in metric tons in Country Laos.
There is a gap of 7499.0 between the highest and lowest Production in metric tons found for 2015 in Country China and Laos.
Among the groups, 2018 had the biggest difference in Production in metric tons. Where the maximum Production in metric tons was 14000.0 times larger than the minimum Production in metric tons.

In Country China, 2018 had the highest Production in metric tons 14000.0 among the 5 groups and in Laos, 2015 had the lowest Production in metric tons 0.0. The second highest Production in metric tons 7500.0 was observed for 2018 in Country China.
On average, the Country China had the highest Production in metric tons for all 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Bolivia had the lowest average Production in metric tons.
